name: The Wolves of Mibu
description:
Let's go a little deeper into Japanese history.

This is a college project, where we learned to work in Unity!

Press Space to go through the story

CREDITS:

The sprites, backgrounds and music were all taken from the Hakuouki game series, all of them belong to Idea Factory and Otomate, please go play the original games, they are the best visual novels i have ever played. View this as a fan game!

Also, some of the UI elements were taken from the free asset pack by
